participant_2.background:
I spend my spare time doing solitary activities like reading and hiking.
I had to move across country for my job.
i am a petsitter.
I love my job as an accountant, but I can't stand heights.
I call my family to catch up and hear about their days.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Good, yourself? I just finished a hike and I'm feeling refreshed.
I love hiking! What trails do you like to hike?
I like to hike the trails near my house because they're not too challenging and I can always bring my dog.
That's awesome! I love dogs, I'm a petsitter myself.
Oh cool! What kind of dogs do you like to pet sit?
I like all dogs but I'm especially fond of golden retrievers.
Golden retrievers are so sweet! I've never met one that wasn't friendly.
Me neither! They're always so happy to see you.
What do you like to do when you're not hiking or pet sitting?
I like to go to the gym, listen to music, and watch movies.
Oh nice! I like to go to the gym too, but I don't really listen to music while I'm there.
I find it helps me focus and push myself harder.
That makes sense. I just like to listen to the sounds of the gym.
To each their own!
Exactly! So what's your favorite movie?
I have a lot of favorite movies but I think my favorite is The Dark Knight.
Oh nice! I love that movie too. Heath Ledger was so good in it.
He was! I wish he was still around.
Me too. He was such a talented actor.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, hike, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I'm especially interested in history and science.
That's awesome! I love learning new things.
Me too! I think it's important to keep learning throughout life
